main event: During an amateur basketball game, witnesses saw a silver to red light in the sky that appeared to go into the ground, rise, drop, and then move into the ground.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 15 minutes,The object appeared to exhibit behavior characteristic of an astronomical body,The report concludes that the object was unidentified and could be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, Handwritten notes mention the object appeared deep orange at times, The sighting occurred on January 11, 1958, in Baxley, Georgia.
sighted object: silver to red light in the sky
witness description: Civilians attending an amateur basketball game
